New Records: Virat Kohli scored 95, narrowly missing a record-breaking century
Mohammed Shami took a five-wicket haul
Rohit Sharma became the first Indian to hit 50-plus sixes in a calendar year
Key Match Events: New Zealand's early dismissals of Devon Conway and Will Young
Rachin Ravindra and Daryl Mitchell's 159-run partnership
India's run chase led by Rohit Sharma and Shubman Gill
Virat Kohli's dismissal just six runs short of a century
Post-Match Reflections: India's first win against New Zealand in the World Cup since 2003
Impact on India's World Cup standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Dharamsala
